name: TranslationsPal
description: Online Real Time Translation By Humans
overview:
TranslationsPal.com is a web-based in real time online translation service powered by human translators. Fast, low cost translation services in all major languages provided by native speakers 24/7, all around the world. Instant pricing. Order and review online.

This professional translation service can be used for all publications and documents; it can become a dedicated multilingual outsourcing support for service sectors, the production of emails, letters, product description, annual reports, agreements, sales brochures, websites and just about any text into just about (almost) any language.

NO human project management is involved when using TranslationsPal.

Who works on your documents?

TranslationsPal has created a global network of professional translators all over the world. TranslationsPal works only with native language speakers who are familiar with the current use and conventions of a language. Crowdsourcing and outsourcing

To avoid human project management, TranslationsPal is working under the crowdsourcing principle. Crowdsourcing is the act of taking a task traditionally performed by an employee or contractor, and outsourcing it to an undefined, generally large group of people or community in the form of an open call. Crowdsourcing provides fast results, thus saving project management time and costs.
